dict.string: Lilu plugin for disabling the "The disk you inserted was not readable by this computer" message at boot on 10.9 or later. Useful if you have other disks with filesystems unknown to macOS.
An open source kernel extension providing a way to emulate some offsets in CMOS (RTC) memory. It can help you to avoid some conflicts between osx AppleRTC and firmware/BIOS of your PC.
An open source kernel extension bringing a platform for arbitrary kext, library, and program patching throughout the system for macOS.
Advanced Apple SMC emulator in the kernel. Requires Lilu for full functioning.
Lilu plugin providing patches to select GPUs on macOS. Requires Lilu 1.2.5 or newer.
An open source kernel extension enabling native macOS HD audio for not officially supported codecs without any filesystem modifications.
An open source kernel extension providing patches for IOBluetoothFamily.
Lilu plugin for disabling Touch ID support.
A Lilu plug-in for dynamic power management data injection.
A Lilu plugin that unlocks the Night Shift function for all Macs.
An open source kernel extension providing patches for unsupported Atheros cards.
An open source kernel extension providing a sync between RTC variables and NVRAM.
An open source kernel extension providing a set of patches required for non-native Airport Broadcom Wi-Fi cards.
A Lilu plugin that disables the hardware JPEG decoding feature of the AppleVPA framework that breaks Preview and Quicklook on some systems.
Lilu plugin for showing the memory tab on MacBookAir and MacBookPro10,x platforms. The tab is normally hidden as these models have soldered memory.
This kext attempts to inject USB ports for each controller, and for hubs as well.
